Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class ActionParser

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ActionParser
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener
public class ActionParser
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
Handles the user input, transforming it in a message for the server. In this case, we decided to make a fatter client, in order to pre-check the correctness of the requests and then have minor server flooding.
Author:
Luca Pirovano

    • action

      public boolean action​(java.lang.String input)
      Synchronized action method; it's called when a player inserts a command in the CLI interface, and manages his selection before sending it to the server through the socket. It also performs an initial check about the rightness of the captured command.

    • propertyChange

      public void propertyChange​(java.beans.PropertyChangeEvent evt)
